info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 14 at 9:35PM MST until August 15 at 12:30AM MST by NWS Tucson AZ
info.description:
* WHAT...Urban area and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of east central Pima county, from near the Tucson International Airport and Rita Ranch south through Sahuarita and into Green Valley.
* WHEN...Until 1230 AM MST.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Rises in small streams and normally dry washes. Dangerous flows over low-water crossings.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 935 PM MST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tucson, Sahuarita, Green Valley, Corona De Tucson, East Sahuarita, San Xavier Community, Summit, Tucson International Airport and Rita Ranch. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM MST FRIDAY
